name: Shifter
description: Represents a Shifter character. Only character owner can modify fields and call functions unless otherwise specified.

instanceFields.label: Size
instanceFields.description: Shifter's size.

instanceFields.label: RunSpeedBase
instanceFields.description: Shifter's base run speed. Final run speed is RunSpeedBase + Size * RunSpeedPerLevel.

instanceFields.label: WalkSpeedBase
instanceFields.description: Shifter's base walk speed. Final walk speed is WalkSpeedBase + Size * WalkSpeedPerLevel.

instanceFields.label: WalkSpeedPerLevel
instanceFields.description: Shifter's walk speed added per level.

instanceFields.label: RunSpeedPerLevel
instanceFields.description: Shifter's run speed added per level.

instanceFields.label: TurnSpeed
instanceFields.description: Shifter's turn speed when running turn animation.

instanceFields.label: RotateSpeed
instanceFields.description: Shifter's rotate speed when rotating body.

instanceFields.label: JumpForce
instanceFields.description: Shifter's jump force when jumping.

instanceFields.label: ActionPause
instanceFields.description: Shifter's pause delay after performing an action.

instanceFields.label: AttackPause
instanceFields.description: Shifter's pause delay after performing an attack.

instanceFields.label: TurnPause
instanceFields.description: Shifter's pause delay after performing a turn.

instanceFields.label: DetectRange
instanceFields.description: (AI) shifter's detect range.

instanceFields.label: FocusRange
instanceFields.description: (AI) shifter's focus range.

instanceFields.label: FocusTime
instanceFields.description: (AI) shifter's focus time before switching targets.

instanceFields.label: FarAttackCooldown
instanceFields.description: (AI) Shifter's cooldown after performing a ranged attack.

instanceFields.label: AttackWait
instanceFields.description: (AI) Shifter's wait time between being in range to attack and performing the attack.

instanceFields.label: AttackSpeedMultiplier
instanceFields.description: Shifter's attack animation speed.

instanceFields.label: UsePathfinding
instanceFields.description: (AI) Shifter uses pathfinding.

instanceFields.label: AIEnabled
instanceFields.description: Enable/Disable AI Behavior (Shifter will not attack/target but pathfinding/move methods will still work).

instanceFields.label: NapePosition
instanceFields.description: The shifter's nape position.

instanceFields.label: DeathAnimLength
instanceFields.description: The length of the death animation.

instanceMethods.label: MoveTo
instanceMethods.description: Causes the (AI) shifter to move towards a position. If ignoreEnemies is true, will not engage enemies along the way.

instanceMethods.label: MoveToExact
instanceMethods.description: Causes the (AI) shifter to move towards a position. If ignoreEnemies is true, will not engage enemies along the way.

instanceMethods.label: MoveToExactCallback
instanceMethods.description: Sort the list using a custom method, expects a method with the signature int method(a,b)

instanceMethods.label: Target
instanceMethods.description: Causes the (AI) shifter to target an enemy character or MapTargetable for focusTime seconds. If focusTime is 0 it will use the default focus time.

instanceMethods.label: Idle
instanceMethods.description: Causes the (AI) shifter to idle for time seconds before beginning to wander. During idle the titan will not react or move at all.

instanceMethods.label: Wander
instanceMethods.description: Causes the (AI) shifter to cancel any move commands and begin wandering randomly.

instanceMethods.label: Blind
instanceMethods.description: Causes the shifter to enter the blind state.

instanceMethods.label: Cripple
instanceMethods.description: Causes the shifter to enter the cripple state.

instanceMethods.label: Attack
instanceMethods.description: Causes the shifter to perform the given attack, if able.
